## ğŸ¯ Available API Endpoints

### License Management
- `POST /api/license/generate` - Generate new license
- `POST /api/license/validate` - Validate license key
- `GET /api/license/{license_id}` - Get license details
- `POST /api/license/{license_id}/activate` - Activate license
- `POST /api/license/{license_id}/deactivate` - Deactivate license
- `DELETE /api/license/{license_id}` - Revoke license

### Authentication
- `POST /api/auth/register` - Register new user
- `POST /api/auth/login` - User login
- `POST /api/auth/logout` - User logout
- `POST /api/auth/refresh` - Refresh session token
- `GET /api/auth/session` - Get session info
- `POST /api/auth/totp/setup` - Setup 2FA
- `POST /api/auth/totp/verify` - Verify 2FA code

### System
- `GET /` - API information
- `GET /health` - Health check
- `GET /docs` - API documentation (Swagger UI)

## ğŸ“ Command Line Interface

**Available Commands:**
```bash
# Start API Server
python3.11 main.py server --port 8088

# Generate License
python3.11 main.py generate \
  --user-id admin \
  --type pro \
  --days 365 \
  --owner "User Name" \
  --email user@example.com

# Validate License
python3.11 main.py validate <LICENSE_KEY>

# Create User
python3.11 main.py create-user \
  --username admin \
  --password secret \
  --email admin@example.com \
  --role admin

# Show Hardware ID
python3.11 main.py hwid

# Show Statistics
python3.11 main.py stats
```
